content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text woodmart_inline=”no” text_larger=”no”]HIKVISION AE-DC2015-B1 (Dash Camera) Items model number :AE-DC2015-B1H.264 Video Compression, 1080p@25fps TF Card, MicroSD Storage upto 128 GB Wi-fi , G-Sensor , built-in MIC, 180° Fish Eye View 5VDC, 1A, Auto recording, easy installation H.264 Video Compression, 1080p@25fps TF Card, MicroSD Storage upto 128 GB Wi-fi , G-Sensor , built-in MIC, 180° Fish Eye View 5VDC, 1A, Auto recording, easy installation Key Features

  • Video: up to 1080p resolution, with 115°FOV
  • Supports the access of one external 1080p camera
  • Storage: supports TF card storage (Max.128GB) and recording overwrite
  • G-sensor: adopts built-in G-sensor, supports lock and backup the recordings when collision occurs, supports event detection
  • Communication: built-in Wi-Fi module
  • APP: supports preview, playback and editing parameters via APP
  • Easy installation and operation
  • Auto recording once the device is powered on
  • Low power consumption and high performance.

What’s in the box:

  • 1 x Dash cam,
  • 2 x windscreen sheet for mounting,
  • 1 x Cigarette socket USB Adaptor,
  • 1 x power cable.

Requires SD Card NOTE: SD Card Not Included in standard option! [/vc_column_text][vc_column_text woodmart_inline=”no” text_larger=”no”]

Download Product Description

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
